deleteNote: Are you sure you want to delete the selected notes?
deleteAllNote: Are you sure you want to delete all notes?
carryToTrash: Are you sure you want to move this note to the trash?
quit: Do you want to sign out?
description: If you log out now, all your notes on the device will be deleted. If you wish, you can access it by logging in again.
backUpDes: With online backup, you can easily get your notes back in case you cannot access your device.
pdfContent: Depending on the length of the content, the pdf creation time may differ. A few pages of texts are often processed within 10 seconds, while texts longer than 10 pages can take a few minutes to convert. (If you have Drive installed on your device, the pdf will open automatically.)
